mapper.insert: INSERT INTO groups ( GROUP_SECERN_ID, GROUP_NAME, CREATED_AT ) VALUES ( #{group_secern_id}, #{group_name}, #{created_at} );
mapper.update: UPDATE groups SET GROUP_SECERN_ID = #{group_secern_id},GROUP_NAME = #{group_name}, UPDATED_AT = #{updated_at} WHERE ID = #{id};
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM groups where is_deleted=0 ORDER BY ID DESC ;
SELECT * FROM groups WHERE ID = #{id} and is_deleted=0;
SELECT * FROM groups WHERE group_secern_id =#{group_secern_id} and is_deleted=0;

SELECT gr.group_name,gs.group_secern_name FROM groups AS gr INNER JOIN portfolio_groups AS pg ON gr.id = pg.group_id INNER JOIN group_secerns AS gs ON gs.id = gr.group_secern_id WHERE pg.service_portfolio_configuration_id = #{id};
